message.body: So george colonel got engaged. I felt like if I told anyone else but you, they wouldn't understand why it's a big deal. Haha.
I know right?!!! I was so surprised! I like this lady for him (speaking as though I know them personally and hang out with them all the time hahah)! You are right, I am one to appreciate such news ;)
Hahaha. It's crazy, but I like her too. Maybe that's why they work well.
I like the fact that she's accomplished and does her own thing.
I'm getting excited for our Sunday together! I probably won't be going out on Friday since we're going out Sunday. I already told Michael that ahead of time.
Okie dokie. If you'd prefer to do something on Friday, lemme know.
